description: Frontend HTML page implementing a database visualizer UI with embedded CSS styles and JavaScript logic for fetching and displaying database, table, and data information.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the backend API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list upon user request, resetting UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands/collapses a database's list of tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads the tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML table markup from data array.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual data cell, handling nulls, objects, and text overflow.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content on user click to show full data.

search-terms: embedded JavaScript for dynamic data loading
fetch API calls for database metadata
